aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-9936-250 at Regional Depot-A

defect_observed.value: Hydraulic line vibration induced fatigue. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 12/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 13/10/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 16/10/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 15/10/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 20/10/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
